events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the senior software engineer position.
The application was categorized under Engineering based on the keywords 'software engineer' in the resume.
Recruiter John Doe has been assigned to manage the screening and interview process for this candidate.
Completed initial phone screening, candidate showed strong understanding of software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM with the engineering team.
Candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent problem solving and coding skills.
HR interview scheduled for May 14th to discuss culture fit and employment terms with the candidate.
HR interview went well; candidate showed alignment with company values and expectations.
An offer letter was sent to the candidate including salary and benefits details as discussed.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the team.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed the start date for June 1st.
Candidate has started onboarding with orientation and initial setup completed successfully.
The hiring process for the senior software engineer position has been successfully closed.
